'''Mondstadt Tourism Revitalization Project''' is a [[Web Event]] in [[Version 4.5]].

==Event Details==
===Duration===
* April 1, 2024 – April 3, 2024 23:59 (UTC+8)

===Summary===
* Successfully pre-register before April 1, 2024 23:59 (UTC+8) to join the first round!
* Pre-register for the first time to obtain {{Item List|Mora*20,000|mode=sent}}!
* Complete all project pre-registrations to unlock exclusive project wallpapers too!

* This additional reward is available to claim until April 3, 2024 23:59 (UTC+8)
